attributes.action: Stop the Deportation of 29yr Old Woman Back to Iran & her CERTAIN DEATH!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask you to step in and stop the deportation of 'xxx' (Name removed for her protection) who is a 29yr old woman from Iran who has 'Converted' to christianity while in england.
Because of which she has been disowned by HER FAMILY in IRAN & has been faxed a letter from the Iranian Court (via her family) stating:
Verdict no.#9619181 of court no 19 of the islamic revolutionary court
names xxx as the defendant and says any one who is an apostate from gods religion (muslim) is deserving to be stoned to death - she had 10 days to respond to this verdict which was given on may the 21st otherwise the verdict (stoning to death) is enforceable!
That means if YOU send her back she WILL BE STONED TO DEATH!, if we CANT send back MUSLIM CLERICS who ARE TERRORISTS because they face the DEATH PENALTY for BEING TERRORISTS, how can we send back a 29yr old WOMAN whos commited NO CRIME only CHANGED her RELIGION!!???!
Please Stop this CRIME from Happening,
Yours,
The Undersigned.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
